pr_title: Add agent config `PROPERTIES_REPORT_PERIOD_FACTOR `, Avoid the instanceTraffic record properties is null.

timeline.message: Add agent config `TIMES_SEND_PROPERTIES`, Avoid the instanceTraffic record properties is null.

timeline.bodyText: FutureReturnValueIgnored:  Return value of methods returning Future must be checked. Ignoring returned Futures suppresses exceptions thrown from the code that completes the Future.
timeline.author: sonatype-lift

timeline.bodyText: FutureReturnValueIgnored:  Return value of methods returning Future must be checked. Ignoring returned Futures suppresses exceptions thrown from the code that completes the Future.
timeline.author: sonatype-lift

timeline.bodyText: Why do you move this ping into the else block? This should be as what it was.
timeline.author: kezhenxu94

replies.bodyText: The KafkaServiceManagementServiceClient need sends the instance properties to the backend every collector.heartbeat_period * collector.times_send_properties seconds
replies.author: zifeihan

replies.bodyText: @kezhenxu94 KafkaServiceManagementServiceClient also need to send the instance properties.
replies.author: zifeihan

replies.bodyText: I think the question is, ping should be sent every time, no else. You should not change this part of the original codes.
replies.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                     * The agent sends the instance properties to the backend every `collector.heartbeat_period * collector.times_send_properties` seconds
          
          
            
                     * The agent sends the instance properties to the backend every `collector.heartbeat_period * collector.properties_report_period_factor` seconds
timeline.author: kezhenxu94
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -142,6 +142,10 @@
          * The period in which the agent report a heartbeat to the backend.
          */
         public static long HEARTBEAT_PERIOD = 30;
+        /**
+         * The agent sends the instance properties to the backend every `collector.heartbeat_period * collector.times_send_properties` seconds
